name: Small
description: Perfect for jewelry boxes, candles, books, mugs, and headphones. Quick and elegant wrapping.

name: Medium
description: Ideal for shirt boxes, board games, blenders, and purses. Enhanced presentation with premium touches.
features: Themed sticker set (e.g., Star Wars, Barbie)
Hidden "gift within gift" (candy or ornament inside) (+$6)

name: Large / Odd
description: For guitars, blankets, toy kitchens, boots, and other large or unusually shaped items.
features: Reversible paper (two patterns in one wrap)

name: Extra-Large / Fragile
description: For bicycles, mirrors, artwork, and multiple items together. Includes special handling for fragile items.
features: LED fairy lights woven into bow (+$12)
